name: Mukah Beach
description: A serene coastal spot ideal for leisurely walks, picnics, and enjoying the sea breeze.

name: Lamin Dana Cultural Boutique Lodge
description: A traditional Melanau longhouse offering cultural experiences, guided tours, and accommodations.
businessHours: Check-in and tour times vary; please refer to their official website

name: Sapan Puloh Melanau Museum
description: A private museum showcasing Melanau artifacts and antiques.
businessHours: Typically open daily; exact hours may vary

name: Sago Factory Chimney
description: A 20-meter tall brick chimney, a relic of Mukah's sago production era in the 19th century.
address: Near the Chinese temple, Mukah, Sarawak, Malaysia

name: Tapak Pesta Kaul Mukah
description: The official venue for the annual Kaul Festival, featuring cultural performances and traditional games.

name: Masjid Setia Raja
description: A prominent mosque known for its distinctive architecture and serene atmosphere.
address: Bandar Baru Mukah, 96400 Mukah, Sarawak, Malaysia
businessHours: Open daily; specific prayer times may apply
